amendment.description: An amendment numbered 67 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds from being used for the Special Presidential Envoy for Climate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burchett amendment (A041) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 212 (Roll no. 490).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burchett amendment (A041) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 212 (Roll no. 490).
